lines.text: It's got be better than this place.

[in his car, on the phone]
If they give us trouble, buy them out.
Uh, looks like dogs loose on the street, Mr. Wagstaff.

[jumping onto the car hood and calling to the others]
This way!
[getting out of the car, accidently hitting a policeman, then pulling him up by his collar]

[several months after the Fluppies have disappeared into their home portal]
You're thinking about them, aren't you?
While they were here, they were driving me crazy, but now I'd give *anything* to have them back. They sure messed up my life.
I'll say. You aren't the same little nerd I used to know. I wonder what they're doing right now?
I don't know, but I betcha it's fun.
